literal_meaning: To fall from a pear tree.
example: When he announced his resignation, I felt like I had fallen from a pear tree.

idiom: Imaš sreće kao da si se rodio s repom
literal_meaning: You have luck as if you were born with a tail.
example: Winning the lottery? You have luck as if you were born with a tail!

figurative_meaning: To be in a good position or to have an advantage.
example: After securing that deal, he is definitely on a horse now.

literal_meaning: You have a nose for it.
figurative_meaning: You have a talent or instinct for something.
example: She has a nose for fashion; she always knows what will be trendy.

literal_meaning: There is no bread without a hoe.
example: If you want to succeed, remember that there is no bread without a hoe.

figurative_meaning: To laugh uncontrollably or very hard.
example: He told such funny jokes that we were all laughing like madmen.
The movie was so hilarious that I was bursting from laughter.
With the new software, everything is going like on lard now.
After all that information, I felt my head spinning.
